description:
PyLadies Melbourne is a Python programming group that welcomes women and genderqueer individuals across Melbourne, Australia. PyLadies is an international mentorship group with a focus on helping more women become active participants and leaders in the Python open-source community. Our mission is to promote, educate and advance a diverse Python community through outreach, education, conferences, events and social gatherings. PyLadies also aims to provide a friendly support network for women and a bridge to the larger Python world. Anyone with an interest in Python is encouraged to participate! It has not been decided yet if any or all of our events will be open to attendance by men. Please check individual event listings carefully.


We follow the PyLadies Code of Conduct: http://www.pyladies.com/CodeOfConduct/
You can also follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/PyLadiesMEL
name: PyLadies Melbourne
